channel.title: CVE Feed for Aminur Islam -- WP Login and Logout Redirect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Aminur Islam -- WP Login and Logout Redirect

item.title: CVE-2024-31927|2024-04-11T12:38:28.458Z -- aminur%20islam -- wp%20login%20and%20logout%20redirect
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Aminur Islam WP Login and Logout Redirect allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Login and Logout Redirect: from n/a through 1.2.
